Issue.creator: elli-androulaki
Issue.summary: As a token infrastructure (peer) developer, I would like to implement the processing of (unauthenticated) list tokens requests with a fully implemented TMS Transactor with listing tokens capabilities
Issue.description: Prover peer component is here linked to a fully implemented TMS Transactor that support listing tokens abilities. TMS Transactor needs to be adjusted to a real ledger interface (compared to FAB-11359). Client requests may still be unauthenticated (not carry any real signature).
